EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Reminder - Toronto
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday 12/4 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop in Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up next Thursday, December 4, in Toronto. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, December 4, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/toronto>
LOCATION Pivotal Labs 1 Toronto Sreet, Suite 1100, 11th Floor Toronto, Ontario, M5C 2V6 Map & Driving Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499311,-79.375757,17z/data=!4m13!1m4!3m3!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2s1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2m2!1d-79.375757!2d43.6499311> Please proceed to the 11th floor reception area upon arrival.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION & PARKING If traveling by public transportation, take the subway to King Station or, the 504 or 508 streetcar to the King/Yonge intersection.
There are several public parking lots located along King Street, all within a few blocks of Pivotal Labs.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet by email <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or by phone at 631-388-0569 <tel:631-388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/toronto>.
